actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that additional years spent in child care may be dropped out in computing benefit amounts.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to permit the exclusion from the calculation of OASDI benefits of the years a parent spends at home caring for a child under the age of six, provided that the parent's earnings during such years do not exceed 50 percent of the SSA wage index (one-half of the average wage of covered workers).

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that additional years spent in child care may be dropped out in computing benefit amounts.
